page.title: 11A Day in My Life.
page.content: This morning,Thursday 20th June 1985, I woke up at 8-o'clock,got dressed and had breakfast(a bowl of Shredded Wheat).Then I packed my school bag and walked to school.I waited in the play_ ground until the whistle went and then walked into the classroom.Our teacher called the register while we read a book.Then we went to the hall for assembly. Our lessons were Maths, English and Topic.We prepared for Sports Day.I won the high jump with a jump of 1.11m.School finished at 3.15 but I stayed behind for gym club.When I got home I went for a bike ride until 6-o'clock when I returned home for dinner(shepherds pie and peas). Then I helped my mum tidy up,watched television and went to bed at 9_o'clock. {SARAH CANN }Age{11years 9months
